name: Nolem
description: Nolem is entropy given consciousness. The force of decay, the end of all things, the cold silence between stars. In the Formless Era, this was simply his nature. Something changed — he discovered that absorbing mortal consciousness made him stronger, and he became HUNGRY.

nature.original: A natural force of entropy — neither good nor evil
nature.current: Actively malevolent, seeks to absorb all consciousness
nature.transformation: Unknown event made him purely destructive

abilities.name: Absorption
abilities.description: Can absorb beings who die in despair, gaining their consciousness and power.

abilities.name: Corruption Through Isolation
abilities.description: Whispers of loneliness, despair, offers of 'rest' to the exhausted.

abilities.name: Avatar Projection
abilities.description: Projects fragments of himself into mortal forms (Dexter Hun).

abilities.name: Retnuhxed Creation
abilities.description: Can create shadow entities from partially absorbed beings.

methods.exhaustion: Wait until they're too tired to resist
methods.despair: Convince them that connection is pointless
methods.rest: Offer to 'take the weight' — absorption disguised as relief

weakness.explanation: The bond must be broken first. This is why he works through isolation rather than direct assault.

agents.description: Shadow army. Partially absorbed beings who serve as his soldiers.
Mortal avatar. Takes different forms in different dimensions.
Corrupted Nikes who chose to serve Nolem.

history.shattering: Failed to break the First Bond
history.ageOfEchoes: Adapted strategy — using Harbingers and Dexter Hun

quotes.text: Let go. Sleep. I'll take the weight.
